References.title: The C-terminal domain of RNA polymerase II interacts with the cleavage and polyadenylation specificity factor
References.authors: Clerte F, Legrain P, Rosbash M

References.title: The human cleavage and polyadenylation specificity factor (CPSF) is a multiprotein complex containing a 73-kDa subunit that binds to the AAUAAA polyadenylation signal
The human cleavage factor I complex contains a zinc finger protein that interacts with the UGUA motif in the 3' untranslated region of mRNAs
The human cleavage factor II complex contains a zinc finger protein that interacts with the UGUA motif in the 3' untranslated region of mRNAs
The human poly(A) polymerase complex contains a zinc finger protein that interacts with the UGUA motif in the 3' untranslated region of mRNAs
